      You may be wondering...

      the Australian Corporate Games is still on track to be held in Melbourne on November 20-22.

      This will be our 28th Australian Corporate Games.

      Entries will open in August.

      Until then, we are keeping close tabs on developments and will keep you advised if there is a change.

      There are exciting plans for the addition of new Sports, as the Games expands to appeal to even more people.

      Stay healthy!! and see you at the Games in November.

      The 2019 Games Results are still available from the right hand tile on this page.

      Legacy

      In 1923, Legacy made a promise to help veterans’ families carry on with their lives after the loss or injury of their loved one. It was a simple promise that Legacy keeps today; providing the same stability, guidance and assistance that a partner would normally provide to his or her family...

      Read More
